full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RKANG BZHI 'PHEL MDZAD GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I MCHOD GTOR 'PHUL BA'I CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB MCHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS SU MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUG BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SGRUBS THABS RIN 'BYUNG DANG, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA GZHI BYAS TE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO LHUN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG GANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO, 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA NGES PAR PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
